ACTIVATED_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and (FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY)) or (FilteredPlayer() ~= nil)
